<title level="1" right="Rules">[Alchemical Elixirs](/Rules.aspx?ID=3183)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Elixirs are alchemical liquids that are used by drinking them. They have the [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=589) trait. These potent concoctions grant the drinker some alchemical benefits.

[Click here for the Alchemical Elixirs category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=8).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
